name: Joanna Cecilia da Silva Santos
content: Joanna Cecilia da Silva Santos - Computer Science and Engineering Assistant Professor, Computer Science and Engineering Contact Email jdasilv2@nd.edu Phone 574-631-0353 Office 382 Fitzpatrick Hall of Engineering Areas of Interest Prof. Santosâ€™ research lies in understanding weaknesses and vulnerabilities through empirical studies to devise novel automated techniques for the development of secure software systems, from inception to deployment. Her work draws on program analysis, software verification, and machine learning algorithms to solve software engineering and security problems such as software vulnerabilities detection, reasoning and formal modeling of architectural properties, and software architecture reverse engineering. Her primary areas of interest are: Software engineering Software security Program analysis Source code manipulation Websites joannacss.github.io Google Scholar Education Ph.D., Computing and Information Sciences, Rochester Institute of Technology, 2021 M.Sc., Software Engineering, Rochester Institute of Technology, 2016 B.Sc., Computer Engineering, Federal University of Sergipe, 2013 News Santos wins Google Research Award ND Engineering welcomes 21 new faculty in 2021 Departments Aerospace and Mechanical Engineering Chemical and Biomolecular Engineering Civil and Environmental Engineering and Earth Sciences Computer Science and Engineering Electrical Engineering Faculty/Staff Resources
